resources.string: Welcome aboard! We are happy to have you here.
A good place to start would be reading instructions. Click the button below to read instructions

From here, all you need to do is to click the button below. You will be taken to a shoeList screen from where you can view a list of shoes available in the inventory. You can also go ahead to add a shoe to the list by clicking the button in the bottom right corner on the shoe list screen. \n That\'s it!
